Articles.Content: I wanted to update the K.A.S mod I have installed and wondered if there's any way you're supposed to do it or if you just re-download the files and replace the old ones?
Replace the plugin and plugindata, but first do a compatibility check

If the mod's forum/spaceport page doesn't say anything then it's often safe to assume you can copy stuff over the top of the old version. If you want to be sure you can delete the old parts, plugins and pluginData from that mod.
